short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The new tab screen is changed. It now features vacation imagery.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover Your Next Getaway: Vacation Tabs is an inspiring Chrome extension that transforms your browsing experience with beautiful, vacation-themed backgrounds. Each time you open a new tab, you're greeted with stunning images from exotic destinations, encouraging you to explore the world.

Features:

Breathtaking Backgrounds: Enjoy a constantly updated gallery of high-quality images from popular vacation spots around the globe. From tropical beaches to serene mountain landscapes, each new tab offers a window to a different part of the world.

The extension will update your default search settings with search results by Yahoo!

By clicking on the "Add to Chrome" button, I accept and agree to installing the ‘Vacation Tabs’ Chrome extension and setting Chrome™ default search to that provided by the service, accept to the other changes made by the service, and to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Privacy Policy: https://monarchdigital.io/privacy
Terms of Service: https://monarchdigital.io/terms
